New Records: Ja Morant's 360-spinning layups generated more than 161 million views across NBA social media platforms.
Morant's first spinning layup over Nets center Nic Claxton in the second quarter is already the NBA's most-watched Facebook reel ever with more than 78 million views in less than 24 hours.
Key Match Events: Ja Morant's two 360-spinning layups from Monday night's loss to the Brooklyn Nets.
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant is quickly returning to his status as one of the NBA's biggest box-office draws after injuries and suspensions derailed parts of his past two seasons.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Morant is averaging 20.7 points and 9.7 assists per game in 28.3 minutes.
Others: The Memphis Grizzlies lost to the Brooklyn Nets.
